text: Bogniebrae is a small rural settlement in Aberdeenshire, Scotland. It is located at the junction of the A97 and B9001 roads, 6 miles from Huntly. It contains the Bognie Arms public house and hotel and a few houses. Remains of Conzie or Bognie Castle, near Bogniebrae, built in the 1660s Bognie Arms public house and hotel ==References== Category:Villages in Aberdeenshire
title: Bogniebrae
